decks.notes: This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal, and efficient creatures to maintain control of the board while putting pressure on the opponent. The deck seeks to tempo out opponents with cards like Daze and Brazen Borrower, while also stripping their hand with cards like Thoughtseize. Murktide Regent and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide late-game threats to close out games. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Orcish Bowmasters and Psychic Frog to further control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan while leveraging the Stoneforge Mystic package to efficiently deploy powerful equipment threats. The deck aims to stabilize the board with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending, and counter key spells with Force of Will and Spell Pierce. Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Time Raveler provide card advantage and control options, while Back to Basics and Counterbalance further disrupt the opponent's mana base and spells. The inclusion of Kaldra Compleat and Batterskull offer additional win conditions and value.

This deck focuses on maintaining control of the game by disrupting opponents with counterspells and removal spells while applying pressure with evasive and efficient creatures. The goal is to limit the opponent's resources and tempo by being proactive in the early game and transitioning into a more dominant position in the mid to late game. By utilizing a mix of disruptive spells and creatures with powerful abilities, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents while steadily chipping away at their life total.

The key concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan with a mix of efficient counterspells and targeted discard spells, while putting pressure on them with aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Murktide Regent. By combining tempo plays like Daze and Fatal Push with powerful threats, the deck aims to control the pace of the game and come out ahead in the end. The mana base is designed to support the dual-color requirements of Dimir, while also being able to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Wasteland.

This deck revolves around quickly milling through the deck to set up a combo win condition using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer. By utilizing fast mana and disruption spells like Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy, the deck aims to find Thassa's Oracle for a game-winning mill effect or Dread Return to reanimate a key creature. The inclusion of cards like Lotus Petal, Dark Ritual, and Simian Spirit Guide allows for explosive starts, while also utilizing creatures like Boggart Trawler and Poxwalkers as combo enablers. The deck prioritizes speed and consistency to execute its combo strategy efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly generate mana through cards like Rite of Flame, Desperate Ritual, and Seething Song to cast powerful spells and combo off with cards like Burning Wish and Bonus Round. Ral, Monsoon Mage provides additional card advantage and Wrenn's Resolve can protect combo pieces from removal. The goal is to efficiently chain together spells and rituals to generate a lethal amount of damage or win the game with a powerful spell from the sideboard using Burning Wish.
